noguild: This command cannot be used inside of private messages or in user-installed space.
userdisabled: You can no longer use this bot, your account has been disabled.
dmdisabled: Couldn't send you the message, your Direct Messages seem to be disabled.
error: Something went wrong, please try again later.

embed.title: You need {bot} Pro to continue
embed.pro_title: The limit of your {bot} Pro was reached!
embed.description: In order to provide a stable bot, and since money doesn't grow on trees, I have to lock non-essential features behind a subscription.

user.guild: You cannot perform this action since you're missing the {perms} permissions.
user.channel: You cannot perform this action since you're missing the {perms} permissions in this channel.

user.text: You cannot perform this action since the highest role of that user is higher than yours.

role.text: You cannot perform this action since your highest role is lower than the role to manage.

me.guild: I cannot perform this action since I'm missing the {perms} permissions.
me.channel: I cannot perform this action since I'm missing the {perms} permissions in this channel.

user.text: I cannot perform this action since the highest role of that user is higher than mine.

role.text: I cannot perform this action since my highest role is lower than the role to manage.

ad.vote: Please help us at {url}, only takes a few seconds

description.1: You cannot view NSFW content in a SFW marked channel.
description.2: Either mark this channel as Age-Restricted or create a new channel and mark it as Age-Restricted.
